project.name: recipe-collection-2025-12-16
project.description: Recipe management system - GitHub/OpenProject integration test

tasks.title: Set up project repository and initial structure
tasks.description: Initialize GitHub repository, create directory structure, set up basic README and project documentation

tasks.title: Design database schema for recipes
tasks.description: Create PostgreSQL schema including recipes table, categories, tags, ratings, and user notes

tasks.title: Implement recipe CRUD API endpoints
tasks.description: Build FastAPI endpoints for creating, reading, updating, and deleting recipes with proper validation

tasks.title: Create search functionality with filters
tasks.description: Implement full-text search for recipes by name, ingredients, and category filters with performance optimization

tasks.title: Build React frontend components
tasks.description: Create recipe card, list view, detail view, and search interface components with responsive design

tasks.title: Implement shopping list generation
tasks.description: Add feature to combine ingredients from multiple recipes into a consolidated shopping list with quantity aggregation

tasks.title: Deploy to VPS and configure CI/CD
tasks.description: Set up deployment pipeline, configure nginx, SSL certificates, and automated testing on flow.ethospower.org
